title: Single releasable order
custom_steps:
GIVEN that the fan has a releasable order
WHEN the fan clicks on/taps the ‘remove order’ option
THEN they will be asked to confirm whether they want to remove the order from their account
GIVEN the fan is prompted to confirm whether they want to remove the order from their account
WHEN the fan selects the ‘Cancel’ option
THEN the user interface will return back to the default state for the releasable order
AND the application will not request that the order be release upon proceeding to checkout
GIVEN the fan is prompted to confirm whether they want to remove the order from their account
WHEN the fan confirms their intent to remove the order
THEN the user interface will indicate that the order is set to be released upon checkout, including an ‘undo’ option
AND the application will request that the order be released upon proceeding to checkout along with the request to renew any orders that will be retained

title: Multiple releasable order
custom_steps:
GIVEN that the fan has multiple releasable order
WHEN the fan clicks on/taps the ‘remove order’ option
THEN they will be asked to confirm whether they want to remove the order from their account
GIVEN the fan is prompted to confirm whether they want to remove the order from their account
WHEN the fan selects the ‘Cancel’ option
THEN the user interface will return back to the default state for the releasable order
AND the application will not request that the order be release upon proceeding to checkout
GIVEN the fan is prompted to confirm whether they want to remove the order from their account
WHEN the fan confirms their intent to remove the order
THEN the user interface will indicate that the order is set to be released upon checkout, including an ‘undo’ option
AND the application will request that the order be released upon proceeding to checkout along with the request to renew any orders that will be retained

title: 2 releasable reservation  in a same order
custom_steps:
GIVEN that the fan has a releasable order
WHEN the fan clicks on/taps the ‘remove order’ option
THEN they will be asked to confirm whether they want to remove the order from their account
GIVEN the fan is prompted to confirm whether they want to remove the order from their account
WHEN the fan confirms their intent to remove the order
THEN the user interface will indicate that the order is set to be released upon checkout, including an ‘undo’ option and "+"(+ indicates more than 1 item) item will be included with description
AND the application will request that the order be released upon proceeding to checkout along with the request to renew any orders that will be retained

title: Undo is present and clickable
custom_steps:
GIVEN that the fan has a releasable order
WHEN the fan clicks on/taps the ‘remove order’ option
THEN they will be asked to confirm whether they want to remove the order from their account
GIVEN the fan is prompted to confirm whether they want to remove the order from their account
WHEN the fan confirms their intent to remove the order
THEN the user interface will indicate that the order is set to be released upon checkout, including an ‘UNDO’ option
AND the application will request that the order be released upon proceeding to checkout along with the request to renew any orders that will be retained
GIVEN Fan clicks the UNDO button
THEN any removed order will be retained
AND the user interface will return back to the default state for the releasable order.
